segments.text: Now that we know what kind of music we will play , we have to decide what each of us will do .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , I love hip hop dancing , so I should probably dance . Do you know how to rap ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh yeah ! I'm a great rapper . And I know all the Vanilla Ice lyrics by heart .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Excellent . I'll start practicing my dance moves .
segments.speaker: S2
